page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: AKELEY FIRST SCHOOL is C.of E. volun- tary controlled, taking children from 5 - 9 years. Some of the local chil- dren attend Akeley Wood School at 4. Classes are small, 36 children, 2.1 teachers and a half day helper. There are two linked classrooms, hall/dining area and playground. Aims are to teach basic skills of literacy, language and numeracy, encourge self expression and develop full potential. School is a busy, happy place where children learn without pain. At 9 they transfer to middle school where they take the 12+ exam and if successful go to Grammar School, otherwise the Secondary Modern which worries some parents who transfer them at 11 to Brackley Comprehensive or pay for private education.
